inclusion.criterion: Incomplete SCI graded C, D or E on ASIA Impairment Scale
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: urinary incontinence, corresponding to a total ICIQ-UI-SF score ≥ 8
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Regular treatment with botox bladder injections or < 1 year since last botox injection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Lack of urodynamic investigation after the SCI
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Lack of ability to contract the pelvic floor muscles during objective clinical examination
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and recurrent UTIs. Urologist not concerned with leaking around suprapubic cath site.
